metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9274 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code as demonstrated by a file containing the string "{\cb-999999999".

criterions.comment: unrtf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
